tit.cmt: セミコロンは不自然なので、括弧に変更しました。

sen.j: 道祖王（ふなどのおおきみ、生年不詳 - 天平勝宝9年(757年)7月）は奈良時代の皇族。
sen.e: Funado no Okimi; Prince Funado, year of birth unknown, died in July 757, is a member of Imperial family in the Nara era.
Prince Funado (year of birth unknown - July 757) was a member of the Imperial family in the Nara period.
sen.cmt: カンマを使用しすぎると、読みづらくなるため、括弧に変更しました。時制が違います。定冠詞が必要です。スタイル違反(奈良時代→Nara period)です。
sen.e: Prince Funado (year of birth unknown - July 757) was a member of the Imperial family in the Nara period.

sen.j: 新田部親王の子で天武天皇の孫。
sen.e: A son of Imperial Prince Nittabe and a grandson of Emperor Tenmu.
The son of Imperial Prince Nittabe and the grandson of Emperor Tenmu.
The son of Imperial Prince Nittabe and the grandson of Emperor Tenmu.

sen.j: 天平9年（737年）従四位下、中務卿。
sen.e: In 737 he was raised to (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade) and Nakatsukasa-kyo.
In 737, he was promoted to Jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade) and Nakatsukasa-kyo.
sen.cmt: カンマが抜けています。raisedよりpromotedの方が良いと思います。Jushiinogeが抜けています。
sen.e: In 737, he was promoted to Jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade) and Nakatsukasa-kyo.

sen.j: 天平12年（740年）従四位上に進む。
sen.e: In 740 he was raised to Jushiijo (Junior Fourth Rank, Upper Grade).
In 740, he was promoted to Jushiijo (Junior Fourth Rank, Upper Grade).
sen.cmt: カンマが抜けています。raisedよりpromotedの方が良いと思います。
sen.e: In 740, he was promoted to Jushiijo (Junior Fourth Rank, Upper Grade).

sen.j: 天平勝宝8歳（756年）5月、聖武天皇が崩御すると、その遺詔で道祖王が孝謙天皇の皇太子に立てられる。
sen.e: In May 756, after Emperor Tenmu demised, Prince Funado became the Crown Prince of Empress Koken by the emperor's will.
In May 756, after the demise of Emperor Tenmu, Prince Funado became the Crown Prince of Empress Koken by the Emperor's will.
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため、一部修正しました。スタイル違反(EmperorのEは大文字)です。
sen.e: In May 756, after the demise of Emperor Tenmu, Prince Funado became the Crown Prince of Empress Koken by the Emperor's will.

sen.j: 天平勝宝9歳（757年）3月、孝謙天皇（実は光明皇后の意思）は、道祖王が太上天皇の喪中にも関わらず侍童と密通して、民間に機密を漏らし甚だ不行跡であるとし、廃太子を議した。
sen.e: In March 757, Empress Koken (actually will of Empress Komyo) proposed to depose Crown Prince, saying that Prince Funado secretly contacted jido and disclosed confidential information to the public in mourning of "Daijo-Tenno"(the retired Emperor); retired emperor.

In March 757, Empress Koken (actually will of Empress Komyo) proposed to depose the Crown Prince, saying that Prince Funado secretly contacted a jido (page) and disclosed confidential information to the public in the mourning of Emperor Daijo.
sen.cmt: jidoだけでは意味が分からないので、説明を加えました。太上天皇は統一用語にあわせEmperor Daijoに変更しました。
sen.e: In March 757, Empress Koken (actually will of Empress Komyo) proposed to depose the Crown Prince, saying that Prince Funado secretly contacted a jido (page) and disclosed confidential information to the public in the mourning of Emperor Daijo.

sen.j: 右大臣藤原豊成以下の群臣はこれに賛同した。
sen.e: Udaijin (minister of the right) FUJIWARA no Toyonari and a crowd or large number of one's retainers or subjects agreed to her proposal.
Udaijin (the minister of the right) FUJIWARA no Toyonari and the retainers under him agreed to her proposal.
sen.cmt: 冠詞を追加し、不要な箇所を削除しました。
sen.e: Udaijin (the minister of the right) FUJIWARA no Toyonari and the retainers under him agreed to her proposal.

sen.j: 道祖王は春宮坊（東宮御所）を夜一人で引き払い「自分は愚か者で皇太子なぞ務まらない」と放言した。
sen.e: Prince Funado withdrew from Togubo (Togu-gosho) by himself and said "I am too foolish to be a Crown Prince".
Prince Funado withdrew from Togubo (Togu-gosho) by himself and said "I am too foolish to be a Crown Prince".
Prince Funado withdrew from Togubo (Togu-gosho) by himself and said "I am too foolish to be a Crown Prince".

sen.j: 4月、孝謙天皇は更に新太子の選定を議さしめた。
sen.e: In April Empress Koken raised another proposal to select new Crown Prince.
In April, Empress Koken raised another proposal to select a new Crown Prince.
sen.cmt: カンマ、冠詞が抜けています。
sen.e: In April, Empress Koken raised another proposal to select a new Crown Prince.

sen.j: 右大臣豊成と中納言藤原永手は道祖王の兄の塩焼王を適当とした。
sen.e: Udaijin Toyonari and Chunagon FUJIWARA no Nagate nominated Prince Shioyaki, a brother of Prince Funado.
Udaijin Toyonari and Chunagon (the vice-councilor of state) FUJIWARA no Nagate nominated Prince Shioyaki, the brother of Prince Funado.
sen.cmt: 中納言は初出のため、説明を加えた方が良いと思います。brotherの前は定冠詞が必要です。
sen.e: Udaijin Toyonari and Chunagon (the vice-councilor of state) FUJIWARA no Nagate nominated Prince Shioyaki, the brother of Prince Funado.

sen.j: 摂津国大夫文室智努と左大弁大伴古麻呂は池田王（天武天皇の皇子舎人親王の子）を推した。
sen.e: Daibu (master) of Settsu Province FUNYA no Chinu and Sadaiben OOTOMO no Komaro nominated Prince Ikeda (a son of Imperial Prince Toneri, a son of Emperor Tenmu).
Daibu (the master) of Settsu Province FUNYA no Chinu and Sadaiben (the controller of the left) OTOMO no Komaro nominated Prince Ikeda (the son of Imperial Prince Toneri, the son of Emperor Tenmu).
sen.cmt: 左大弁は初出のため、説明を加えた方が良いと思います。スタイル違反(長音はooとしない)です。冠詞が間違っています。
sen.e: Daibu (the master) of Settsu Province FUNYA no Chinu and Sadaiben (the controller of the left) OTOMO no Komaro nominated Prince Ikeda (the son of Imperial Prince Toneri, the son of Emperor Tenmu).

sen.j: 紫微令の藤原仲麻呂は帝が選ばれるべきと提議した。
sen.e: Shibirei(derector general of Shibi institution) FUJIWARA no Nakamaro proposed it should be selected by the Empress.
Shibirei (the director general of the Sheba institution) FUJIWARA no Nakamaro proposed the Crown Prince should be selected by the Empress.
sen.cmt: スペースが抜けています。スペルミスがあります。定冠詞が必要です。itは不自然です。
sen.e: Shibirei (the director general of the Sheba institution) FUJIWARA no Nakamaro proposed the Crown Prince should be selected by the Empress.

sen.j: 孝謙天皇は道祖王が不行跡で廃されたのだから兄の塩焼王は不適当であるとした。
sen.e: Empress Koken said Prince Shioyaki, a brother of Prince Funado who was deposed due to his misconduct, is not appropriate.
Empress Koken said Prince Shioyaki (the older brother of Prince Funado) was not appropriate because Prince Funado was deposed due to his misconduct.
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため、修正しました。
sen.e: Empress Koken said Prince Shioyaki (the older brother of Prince Funado) was not appropriate because Prince Funado was deposed due to his misconduct.

sen.j: 舎人親王の家系では船王は閨房が定まらず、池田王は親不孝であるとした。
sen.e: Meanwhile in the family line of Imperial Prince Toneri, Prince Fune does not have a stable wife and Prince Ikeda is an undutiful son.
Meanwhile in the family line of Imperial Prince Toneri, Prince Fune did not have a stable wife and Prince Ikeda was an undutiful son.
Meanwhile in the family line of Imperial Prince Toneri, Prince Fune did not have a stable wife and Prince Ikeda was an undutiful son.

sen.j: 淳仁天皇のみが悪い噂を聞かないので大炊王を皇太子に立てるべきとした。
sen.e: Since only Emperor Junnin did not have bad rumors, she said Prince Oi should be the Crown Prince.
Since only Emperor Junnin did not have bad rumors, she said Prince Oi should be the Crown Prince.
Since only Emperor Junnin did not have bad rumors, she said Prince Oi should be the Crown Prince.

sen.j: 群臣はこれに従った。
sen.e: A crowd or large number of one's retainers or subjects followed.
Her retainers agreed to her proposal.
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため、修正しました。
sen.e: Her retainers agreed to her proposal.

sen.j: 大炊王は仲麻呂の自邸に住んでいるのみならず、早世した長男藤原真従の未亡人である粟田諸姉を妻としていた。
sen.e: Prince Oi not only lived in the house of Nakamaro but his wife was Awata Shoshi, widow of FUJIWARA no Mayori, the eldest son who died young.
Prince Oi not only lived in the house of Nakamaro but he was also married to AWATA no Morone (the widow of FUJIWARA no Mayori, the deceased eldest son of Nakamaro).
sen.cmt: 下記のサイトによると藤原真従は仲麻呂の長男のようです。長男だけでは、文の意味が理解しにくいため、追加しました。http://www.asahi-net.or.jp/~sg2h-ymst/junnin.html粟田諸姉は「あわたしょし」ではなく、「あわたのもろえ/もろね」です。検索すると「もろね」の方が一般的なようなので、「もろね」を使用しました。http://kotobank.jp/word/粟田諸姉また、文の流れを自然にするため、修正しました。
sen.e: Prince Oi not only lived in the house of Nakamaro but he was also married to AWATA no Morone (the widow of FUJIWARA no Mayori, the deceased eldest son of Nakamaro).

sen.j: 大炊王の立太子は仲麻呂の強い希望であった。
sen.e: Nakamaro had a strong wish for investiture of the Crown Prince of Prince Oi.
Nakamaro strongly wished Prince Oi to be the Crown Prince.
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため、修正しました。
sen.e: Nakamaro strongly wished Prince Oi to be the Crown Prince.

sen.j: 仲麻呂は紫微内相（大臣に准じる）に進む。
sen.e: Nakamaro promoted to Shibinaiso (equivalent to minister).
Nakamaro was promoted to Shibinaiso (equivalent to minister).
Nakamaro was promoted to Shibinaiso (equivalent to minister).

sen.j: 仲麻呂の台頭に不満を持ったのが橘奈良麻呂だった。
sen.e: TACHIBANA no Nakamaro was dissatisfied with promotion of Nakamaro.
TACHIBANA no Naramaro was dissatisfied with the promotion of Nakamaro.
sen.cmt: ミススペル(Naramaro)です。定冠詞が抜けています。
sen.e: TACHIBANA no Naramaro was dissatisfied with the promotion of Nakamaro.

sen.j: 大伴古麻呂らと一味して兵を起こして仲麻呂を殺し、孝謙天皇を廃して、塩焼王、道祖王、安宿王、黄文王の中から天皇を推戴しようと計画した。
sen.e: He planned to kill Nakamaro in cooperation with OOTOMO no Komaro, depose Empress Koken, and have any of Prince Shioyakki, Prince Funado, Prince Asukabe, or Prince Kibumi, to be the new emperor.
He planned to kill Nakamaro in cooperation with OTOMO no Komaro, depose Empress Koken, and have Prince Shioyakki, Prince Funado, Prince Asukabe, or Prince Kibumi become the new emperor.
sen.cmt: スタイル違反(長音はooとしない)です。文法（使役動詞）が違います。
sen.e: He planned to kill Nakamaro in cooperation with OTOMO no Komaro, depose Empress Koken, and have Prince Shioyakki, Prince Funado, Prince Asukabe, or Prince Kibumi become the new emperor.

sen.j: 7月、この計画は密告によって露見した。
sen.e: In July this plan was exposed by anonymous report.
In July, this plan was exposed by an anonymous report.
sen.cmt: カンマ、冠詞が抜けています。
sen.e: In July, this plan was exposed by an anonymous report.

sen.j: 奈良麻呂、古麻呂、黄文王らをはじめ、前皇太子の道祖王も謀反に関わったとして捕えられた。
sen.e: Not only Naramaro, Komaro, Prince Kibumi, but Prince Funado, ex-Crown Prince were arrested for involvement in the rebellion.
Naramaro, Komaro, Prince Kibumi as well as Prince Funado, the former Crown Prince, were all arrested for their involvement in the rebellion.
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため、修正しました。
sen.e: Naramaro, Komaro, Prince Kibumi as well as Prince Funado, the former Crown Prince, were all arrested for their involvement in the rebellion.

sen.j: 道祖王は名を麻度比（惑い者）と改名させられ、藤原永手、百済王敬福、船王らの監督下、杖で激しく叩かれる拷問を受けた末、獄死。
sen.e: Prince Funado was forced to change his name to Madoi (misled man), and tortured violently by a stick under the control of FUJIWARA no Nagate, Kyofuku KUDARANOKONIKISHI, and Prince Fune, and died in prison.

Prince Funado was forced to change his name to Madoi (misled man), and he died in prison after being tortured violently with a stick under the control of FUJIWARA no Nagate, Kyofuku KUDARANOKONIKISHI and Prince Fune.
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため、修正しました。
sen.e: Prince Funado was forced to change his name to Madoi (misled man), and he died in prison after being tortured violently with a stick under the control of FUJIWARA no Nagate, Kyofuku KUDARANOKONIKISHI and Prince Fune.

sen.j: （橘奈良麻呂の乱）
sen.e: (The revolt of TACHIBANA no Naramaro)
